attributes.action: Stop MCS increasing the cost of the MCS credits by 133%.
attributes.additional_details: Installation companies need more of a notice period on decisions like this so they can build it in to their project costs.
attributes.background: Many companies throughout the UK will have projects ongoing which they won based on the £15 charge for an MCS credit. If these companies are working for a housing developer and there is 60 houses with Solar PV, there would be a significant cost increase for the installer which hasn't been budgeted.

rejection.details:
